project.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: change the frame rate and aspect ration of a video Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hellowworld" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-02-CENTOS OR GOOD-02-UBUNTU OR GOOD-02-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-03
iopair.description: remove the audio and change the video format from .mov to .mp4 using the mpeg4 codec Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-03-CENTOS OR GOOD-03-UBUNTU OR GOOD-03-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-04
iopair.description: copy the audio file and convert the number of audio channels to 2. Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-05
iopair.description: remove original audio from a file and combine the audio from another file to create a new video and audio file Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hellowworld" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-07

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-08-CENTOS OR GOOD-08-UBUNTU OR GOOD-08-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-09
iopair.description: Convert images into a video Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Extract every fifth frame and convert it to an image Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: ((GOOD-10-1-CENTOS AND GOOD-10-2-CENTOS) OR (GOOD-10-1-UBUNTU AND GOOD-10-2-UBUNTU) OR (GOOD-10-1-DEBIAN AND GOOD-10-2-DEBIAN)) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="AAAAA.AAAAAAAA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_gip9uSJv3xtiXUz2VbVB AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_zaAOl5F8QN OR (NOT finished_0j3StUVVUe AND NOT (controlled_exit_XY0MOIkH1B OR continued_execution_OC4h3CxFNO)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_zaAOl5F8QN OR (NOT finished_0j3StUVVUe AND NOT (controlled_exit_XY0MOIkH1B OR continued_execution_OC4h3CxFNO))) OR controlled_exit_XY0MOIkH1B)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_zaAOl5F8QN OR (NOT finished_0j3StUVVUe AND NOT (controlled_exit_XY0MOIkH1B OR continued_execution_OC4h3CxFNO)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_zaAOl5F8QN OR (NOT finished_0j3StUVVUe AND NOT (controlled_exit_XY0MOIkH1B OR continued_execution_OC4h3CxFNO))) OR controlled_exit_XY0MOIkH1B))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;

iopair.name: C-C835A-FFMP-01-ST03-DT02-DF11-CF24-01-BAD-02
iopair.description: Infinite Loop that checks each character of input and if it is ascii val 48 or higher, updates the exit counter. Otherwise it doesn't, resulting in an infinite loop

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="This statement will break it" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_vmQJlQGPfu9sA7aEUESA AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_0906fv1fHm OR (NOT finished_ixammV1EIo AND NOT (controlled_exit_NcUaMiFpFP OR continued_execution_PT9MgxKuII)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_0906fv1fHm OR (NOT finished_ixammV1EIo AND NOT (controlled_exit_NcUaMiFpFP OR continued_execution_PT9MgxKuII))) OR controlled_exit_NcUaMiFpFP)))

(NOT PERFORMER AND (timeout_0906fv1fHm OR (NOT finished_ixammV1EIo AND NOT (controlled_exit_NcUaMiFpFP OR continued_execution_PT9MgxKuII)))) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((timeout_0906fv1fHm OR (NOT finished_ixammV1EIo AND NOT (controlled_exit_NcUaMiFpFP OR continued_execution_PT9MgxKuII))) OR controlled_exit_NcUaMiFpFP))

output_checks.simple_check: if (( $(/bin/grep "finished evaluating" "logfile.txt" | wc -l) > 0 )); then true; else false; fi;
